name: Get to Fuscia City without using a bike
Fuse two different baby pokes together
Hatch an egg
Inflict an opposing Poke with freeze
Defeat a Gym Leader with only Ground Type Pokes
Obtain all 3 fishing rods
Obtain 10 hidden items on the overworld
Have 12 different types among your party Pokes
Have 100 unfused Pokes
Defeat all Pewter Gym trainers (3)
Have a Poke with four maxed stat increases in a battle
Use a stone to evolve a Poke
Defeat a Gym Leader with only Electric Type Pokes
Catch or faint both Snorlax encounters
Catch or faint Zapdos encounter
Defeat all trainers on Route 9 (9)
Defeat Zapmolcuno before Blaine
Have a Poke with exactly 50 Special Defense
Obtain a Moon Stone from the dancing Clefairy
Obtain 15 different TMs
Evolve a Poke before defeating Brock
Complete 5 different trades (no wonder trade)
Have your Poke become confused by their own move
Reach Cinnabar Island from Seafoam Island
Defeat Robot R.E.D.
